about_the_game:
Start your engines! Purchase the Husqvarna Pack and experience real off-road riding!

This pack includes the following vehicles:

  • 2023/2024 Husqvarna TC 125 MX
  • 2023/2024 Husqvarna TC 250 MX
  • 2023/2024 Husqvarna FC 250 MX
  • 2023/2024 Husqvarna FC 450 MX
detailed_description:
Start your engines! Purchase the Husqvarna Pack and experience real off-road riding!

This pack includes the following vehicles:
